data.title: Luis Cruz stats and ratings
data.meta_description: Luis Cruz profile player page. Goals, matches, stats, player ratings and more.
data.text:
Luis Cruz is 27 years old (Jan 16, 1997), 181 cm tall and plays for Reboceros de La Piedad.

If Luis Cruz is going to be in Reboceros de La Piedad lineup, it will be confirmed on Sofascore one hour before the match starts.

If Luis Cruz plays you will also be able to follow his live Sofascore rating, statistics and heatmap. Luis Cruz football player profile displays all matches and competitions with statistics for all the matches Luis Cruz played in. Most important stats for each competition, including average Sofascore rating, matches played, goals, assists, cards and other relevant data are also displayed.
